title: @wuks Your Australian Pals
body:
Hi @wuks, we met on an OCE bots game and you said we could reach you here! This is about Xayah and Rakan thing you were speaking about, please message me back!
Thanks a bunch!

replies.body: @wuks Hi me again, uh me and my duo partner have played multiple games as Rakan and Xayah and we do not have the blazing feathers icon. Does it take a few days to come in or do we have to play more?

Icons will be granted within 2 weeks after the event has concluded. 

The event concludes on Thursday, April 27th @ 16:59 AEST
It should come in soon, though! Fingers crossed!

Ayy! The icons are out!

https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2017/april/xayahrakanicons/Icon_Summoner_Duo_Winning_01_256.jpg You can earn the first icon, the Blazing Feathers Icon, by:

> Earn a special summoner icon by bringing Xayah and Rakan together on the Rift. To qualify, play two games as Xayah with Rakan on your team, or as Rakan with Xayah on your team. Any completed normal, ranked, or bot game mode will count (custom games excluded).

https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2017/april/xaravn/Icon_Summoner_Duo_Gifting.jpg The second icon: 

> Unlike other champs, Xayah and Rakan can be gifted using IP between April 20-27! Gift Xayah or Rakan to a friend for just 6300 IP (normally 7800 IP) and unlock an exclusive Summoner Icon for yourself (also works if you gift using RP).
